{{Article history | action1=GAN | action1date=13:58, 29 September 2014 (UTC) | action1link=Talk:Paxata/GA1 | action1result=failed | action1oldid=618494903 | action2=GAN | action2date=23:40, 11 January 2015 (UTC) | action2link=Talk:Paxata/GA2 | action2result=promoted | action2oldid=642073801 | currentstatus=GA | topic=Engineering and technology }} {{WikiProject Articles for creation|class=GA|ts=20140629155002|reviewer=Timtrent}} {{WikiProject Software|class=GA|importance=low||computing-importance=low}} {{Talk:Paxata/GA1}} {{Talk:Paxata/GA2}} == Minor updates == {{request edit|A}} Suggest the following updates: * Add to the end of the History section: "It raised an additional $18 million in funding in September 2015.{{cite web | last=Harris | first=Derrick | title=This startup raised $18 million to make data analysis less of a chore | website=Fortune | date=September 9, 2015 | url=http://fortune.com/2015/09/09/paxata-funding-data-analysis/ | accessdate=October 13, 2015}}" * Add to the second paragraph of the Features section: "It runs on [[Apache Spark]].{{cite web | title=Paxata Applies Data Governance Controls to Big Data | website=IT Business Edge | date=April 23, 2015 | url=http://www.itbusinessedge.com/blogs/it-unmasked/paxata-applies-data-governance-controls-to-big-data.html | accessdate=August 20, 2015}}" * Add to he end of the History section: "It also began working with Cisco to jointly develop the Cisco Data Preparation suite of software and services.{{cite web | title=Cisco Makes Move Into Data Preparation Space | website=eWeek.com | date=September 30, 2015 | url=http://www.eweek.com/networking/cisco-makes-move-into-data-preparation-space.html | accessdate=October 13, 2015}}"

References
{{Reflist-talk}} :Done. --[[User:Guy Macon|Guy Macon]] ([[User talk:Guy Macon|talk]]) 19:28, 15 December 2015 (UTC)
